DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine normal eyelid sensation distribution use Cochet-Bonett Aesthesiometer .
DOC.detailed_description: After proper take consent patient without previous eyelid surgery Oculoplastic clinic Duke Eye Center Duke Aesthetic Center enrol test eyelid sensation distribution use Cochet-Bonnet aesthesiometer . The aesthesiometer ( Luneau ophthalmologie ) 0.12mm diameter filament chosen ease use , sensitivity , safety . This instrument contain 6 cm long , retractable , flexible monofilament . For give length , apply perpendicularly test surface , filament exert precise pressure visibly bend . The filament length inversely correspond pressure exert aesthesiometer . Selection eyelid laterality randomize day study . Ipsilateral upper low eyelid divide third ( medial , central lateral border ) include margin ( fig.2 ) . The eyelid sensation test every third apply tip aesthesiometer filament perpendicular eyelid skin tarsal plate filament bent slightly . The filament length set 6 cm ( long length ) apply test site 3 time . This process repeat 3 time patient verbally respond 3rd touch , number 6 recorder . If patient respond less 3 3 time , filament shorten 0.5 cm test repeat . This process continue shorten filament 0.5 cm time , patient feel filament touch 3 3 time . This filament length number record touch reading time period . The mean touch threshold various test site compare use Freidman two-way analysis variant ( ANOVA ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Capable willing provide consent Has see first time Oculoplastic clinic previous eyelid surgery At least 18 year age Unable unwilling give consent Under 18 year age Previous eyelid surgery
